link.subjects: Pope Francis → The late Queen Elizabeth II

link.verification_notes: While multiple meetings are documented, finding a single photograph or video encompassing both individuals might require extensive searching across different news archives and official Vatican sources. Fortification attempts to find a Tier 1 source proved difficult due to the formal nature of the meetings and the stringent access protocols.
